message: For people who published apps with Google play, Can I publish an app which is still under heavy development ?

data.message:
i don't remember anything saying they will review the app, that was a year ago, they might have changed their regulations. 
You can also publish the app as closed beta, it will be on play store, people with invitations only can download it, using a custom link. Won't show in search.
I also suggest publishing it in beta so you can choose testers to download and help you test it
you can publish on alpha or beta testing
and now Google play is reviewing the published apps before publishing, you have to submit a rating for your app to be reviewed before publishing
